long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The QR Code Generator Extension is a lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to quickly generate QR codes for any website URL. Users can input a URL into a simple, user-friendly interface, and a QR code is generated instantly. This makes it convenient for sharing web links via mobile devices, as QR codes can be easily scanned by smartphones.
